reviews.review: O                  T R A P A Ç A
Игра супер только есть геи которые тебя пиздят и которые мешают играть вот они пидорасы
游戏环境贼鸡儿差，并不推荐入坑。

The game is really fun, if you don't mind the glitches and terrible development. Glitching out of bounds, lag/desync, and hackers... just to name a few. And why is this game over 50 gigabytes? I can install Dark Souls 3 more than twice over with that kind of room. Fix the spaghetti code, actually optimize the game, and don't wait for public outcry to implement essentials such as colourblindness settings.
Зашли и вышли, приключение на 20 минут
I have around 30 hours in this game and 28 out of that 30 hours was constant abuse from overpowered killers with no life. Would definitly recommend for masochists.
esse jogo é inspirado no jonhas
so obsessed with this game. so hard to put the game down once i've launched the game
Pretty fun with friends, IDK just trying to level up steam this was a task.
игра очень добрая и главное позитивная ни разу за игру не видел крови)))))))))))))))))))))))))
非常好玩！一开始对萌新不是特别友好，但是当段位上去后就会发现这个游戏的真正乐趣，你会喜欢上游戏中各种博弈。强烈推荐！记得开加速器，可以去韩服和棒子碰一碰。
i love this game so much xD

10/10

Matchmaking makes this game very tough for noobs. Only bought it because it was linked to L4D so expected a similar game but was very disapointed.

Самая лучшая игра! Никаких багов, ошибок, разрабы всегда стараются улучшить игру!!!!!!!!!!!!

I played this game and pissed myself. I recommend this game.
Good game, definitely a change of pace compared to other games. Overall its an outstanding survivor horror that I think anybody can play and love.
对新手不太友好吧，不过气氛挺好的

I like the game's whole idea. And definitely fun with friends. There's certainly a bias towards killers in my opinion. And I play both so I'm not just salty it really is too easy for killers to camp and ruin the fun for that one unlucky person.

But for the love of god, fix your network issues and bugs. Sync error 112 and player level update errors that makes you lose all the exp and bloodpoints you earned makes this game literally unplayable, and frankly grounds for a full refund! Until then do not buy this.

bien
mais le matchmaking est a revoir
游戏很好玩，与人斗其乐无穷。单边屠夫玩家之前一百多个小时玩三哥打针对，最近被削了后结果被人皇溜自闭了，现在买了巴布很欢乐，守就完了。人皇是吧，我能花一整局陪你溜，成你就跑，输就挂你一整局，恶心死你，谁也别想有体验。还是那句话，守就完了，树下孝子yyds！
El juego no está mal como tal. El problema es que muchas veces se cierra sin motivo y te penalizan. Las penalizaciones van aumentando y no te dejan jugar durante días por motivos ajenos a ti.
Fun games if you have freinds

Gets boring after the first hour
